pages.title: Patagornis
pages.text: Patagornis is a genus of extinct flightless predatory birds of the family Phorusrhacidae.$(br2)Known as "terror birds", these lived in what is now Argentina during the Early and Middle Miocene; the Santa Cruz Formation in Patagonia contains numerous specimens.

pages.title: Patagornis
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Active during Daytime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:rabbit$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: None Days
